data.title: Friendly Service
data.text: Great and quick service by Arby's manager. Really appreciated his kindness and approach to customer service. We dined inside and everything was very clean.

data.title: Above Average!
data.text: As far as fast food joints go Arby's is my favorite. Better than average selection and quite good. Love the "Loaded Italian", Gyro is good and can't resist the Beef & Cheese! Especially with that great Arby's sauce. Employees were top notch, restaurant clean and rest rooms nice. What more can you expect from Arby's? Good lunch, nice experience! Go!

data.title: Clean Yum
data.text: Clean place to dine in or use the drive thru. Typical Arby's food. Fun to ring the bell on your way out if you had good service. Potato cakes with Arby's sauce & the classic sandwiches are my fav!

data.title: Should have gone to Taco Bell!
data.text:
Me, when they present my to-go order on a tray: To Go, please.
Tattooed cashier: What note?
Me: To go, please.
Tattooed cashier, muttering: I only asked you five times.
Me: You asked the guy after me five times. You only asked me once, and I said, to go.
Tattooed cashier: I'm not touching your fries.

All I wanted was a sandwich and some curly fries. What I got was an almost funny bad attitude, a decent sandwich, and over-fried/borderline burnt curly fries. That'll teach me!

data.title: Good fast food
data.text: Good fast food althoug like many others it had lots of oil still driping from the food. But well it took the hunger away. Staff was very friendly and helpfull.
